data.name: No Mans Land
data.detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition

Pre order the digital deluxe edition and receive Markov, the Russian character free as an exclusive in game character! Coming with a 1 of a kind Ak-47 with higher damage, better accuracy and a 55 round magazine!
Also receive the Season Pass that grants you access to all paid for dlc, and exclusive items after launch!


About the Game

NoMansLand
No Mans Land is a poly art Zombie Survival game. You can craft,
loot and shoot your way around the map. Play alone, or with a
group of people. Choose how you lived your life previously, and
make your way into a new life, living along side the zombies. Just
remember to sleep with one eye open!

Craft!
Craft up to 40 different items including
-weapons
-fortifications
-food
-drink
-health items
and many many more!

Explore!
Explore a vast and changing landscape as you wonder through Candigo City.
Explore the industrial district, the marina, the Military outpost and many other locations

Survive
Your ultimate goal is to survive! You have no other option, its you or them! Fight for your survival, make allies but
never let anyone close enough to kill you! Its you, your gear and your instinct that will keep you alive.

data.short_description: No Mans Land is a poly art Zombie Survival game. You can craft, loot and shoot your way around the map. Play alone, or with a group of people. Choose how you lived your life previously, and make your way into a new life, living along side the zombies. Just remember to sleep with one eye open!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: amd fx 4300, Core i5 3330
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: amd fx 4300, Core i5 3330
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A
